name: What the Hellyfish!?
description:
What a Hellyfish!? can be played by 2, 3 or 4 players

...and keep in mind avoid touching the jellyfishes, push your friends towards them instead.

How to play - Xbox Controllers (2, 3 or 4 players) -

2 players can play on a single controller.

A player plays with a joystick, and the corresponding trigger and bumper.

  • Use the joystick to face a direction.
  • Hold the trigger to swim towards that direction.
  • Hold the bumper button to charge a water wave, release to release a wave on the direction you are facing.

On the web version, your browser needs the HTML5 Gamepad API, check Gamepad support on this compatibility table.

How to play - Keyboard (2 players) -

Player ONE

  • Use the WASD keys to face a direction.
  • Hold the B key to swim towards that direction.
  • Hold the V key to charge a water wave, release to release a wave on the direction you are facing.

Player TWO

  • Use the Cursor keys to face a direction.
  • Hold the I key to swim towards that direction.
  • Hold the O key to charge a water wave, release to release a wave on the direction you are facing.

Credits:

A game made for Global Game Jam 2017 in Game Jam Barcelona 2017 (link)

Ferran Bertomeu @fonserbc

Sergi Cebrián @sexyytomato

Nico Delgado @nico_codrilo

David LLanos @davidllanos22

Jordi Serra @turmixs

No Jellyfish Were Harmed in the Making of This Game

Attention the Xbox Controllers version main not work property (it depends on the OS and browser) your browser needs the HTML5 Gamepad API, check Gamepad support on this compatibility table.
